summary: Comprehensive testing of Right Doers World AI-native workforce matching platform completed. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend has excellent UI/UX with proper error handling. OTP authentication flow works correctly but requires actual OTP from API response. All major features tested successfully including landing page, consumer services, Junicorn NET, and government dashboard flows.

integration_issues.issue: OTP verification requires actual OTP from API response, demo OTPs don't work
integration_issues.note: This is correct behavior - OTP must match the one returned by send-otp API. Error handling works properly with 'Invalid OTP' message.

integration_issues.issue: Only Health category found out of 12 expected service categories
integration_issues.note: Service providers page works correctly with mock data, but category grid may need all 12 divisions

passed_tests: Backend API Root Endpoint - 200 OK
Backend Seed Data Creation - 10 sample jobs created
Backend Phone OTP Send - Demo OTP returned correctly
Backend Phone OTP Verify - Authentication working with correct OTP
Backend User Creation (All roles) - Working
Backend Jobs API - 10 seeded jobs returned with filters
Backend Job Creation & Applications - Working
Backend AIMEE AI Chat - Gemini 3 Flash integration working
Backend Admin Stats - Dashboard statistics working
Frontend Landing Page - Hero section, 4 user type cards, stats, QR code, Junicorn CTA
Frontend User Type Cards - All 4 types (Talent, Consumer, Company, Government) present with correct routing
Frontend Authentication Pages - Role-specific login pages with proper branding
Frontend OTP Flow - Send OTP, Enter OTP, proper error handling for invalid OTP
Frontend Consumer Services - Search, pincode input, category navigation working
Frontend Service Providers - Mock health providers displayed with ratings and pricing
Frontend Junicorn NET Landing - Complete page with qualities, age groups, benefits, Dubai summit info
Frontend Junicorn Apply Button - Redirects correctly to auth
Frontend Government Auth - Role-specific authentication page
Frontend Error Handling - Proper toast notifications for invalid OTP
Frontend Navigation - Smooth transitions between pages
Frontend Responsive Design - Works well on desktop viewport
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding all 12 service categories to consumer services page grid. OTP authentication works correctly but requires using actual OTP from API response for testing.
